document_data.name: Tarana Lyr
document_data.mainbody: '''Tarana Lyr''' was a female [[human]] [[sorceress]] and a worshiper of [[Bane]] before and during the [[Time of Troubles]] in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.History: Tarana was a crazy sorceress in the service of Bane during the god's assault on [[Tantras]].
document_data.Personality: The power of sorcery had long ago driven Tarana mad. She enjoyed the unpredictability of magic during the Time of Troubles and the sensation of playing with death.{{cite book/Tantras|4-6}}
